channel.title: The Revolutionary [Neutral Special]
channel.description:
**Call to Arms(Passive)** - All Neutral Classes in the game will share your winning condition, even the King **Midnight Gathering(Passive)** - All Neutral Classes will speak at night **Promote(Day)** - Select a player to become the Revolutionary if you die - Infinite Uses **Bump Off(Night)** - Kill a player - Only usable if there are no living Neutral Killers **Search(Night)** - Learn a player's class - 1-night cooldown *Objective: Ensure that only Neutrals are left standing*
has a low spawn chance

item.title: The Revolutionary [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
The existence of this class would cause the win rates of Merc and Alchemist to plummet.

Read full topic

item.title: The Revolutionary [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
I like it but I feel like it would only further the “NEUTS OUT” meme

Read full topic

item.title: The Revolutionary [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
So how does this work with the mercenary? I would make the Call to Arms passive be all UNCONVERTABLE Neutral classes share your wincon. Same with the midnight gathering. That way the merc isn’t converted and outs all the Neutrals or has his contract die twice and dies even thought he can still win. Other than that I think it is good. One question thought. What happens if the Revolutionary dies without choosing someone to promote?

Overall I like this class!

Read full topic

item.title: The Revolutionary [Neutral Special]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Call to Arms(Passive) - All Neutral Classes in the game will share your winning condition, even the King
Midnight Gathering(Passive) - All Neutral Classes will speak at night
Promote(Day) - Select a player to become the Revolutionary if you die - Infinite Uses
Bump Off(Night) - Kill a player - Only usable if there are no living Neutral Killers
Search(Night) - Learn a player’s class - 1-night cooldown
Objective: Ensure that only Neutrals are left standing

has a low spawn chance
